Translations.Text: DI kon PUT who your enemies est DI est NUR Lord Mastr DI est NUR Supporter

(Among those est Jewish kelk distort vort truth ili dir Ni auxd ni disobey Your vort fal surd orel Raa'ena est our shepherd as ili tord their lang mok religi! Hav ili dir Ni auxd ni obe Ni auxd vi Unzurna watch us) gxi est put por them kaj righteous! Instead ili incurred condemnation DI their disbelief. Consequently majority de them ne kred
O vi ricev scripture vi kred en ki ni reveal herein konfirm ki vi hav antaux ni banish nepr vizagx ekzil kondamn them as ni kondamn those desecrated Sabbath! Di ordon done
DI NE forgive idolatry LI forgives lesser offenses whomever LI VOL. Anyone sets idols DI forgx horrendous offense
Vi not those hav exalt? Instead DI est Unu exalts whomever Li vol malplej injustice
Not kiel ili fabricate mensog DI; ki gross offense this est
Vi not those ricev portion scripture kaj kiel ili kred en idolatry false doctrine tiam dir disbelievers est put direkt than believers
